text: monawa unath me wage law sin kiyawaddi podi gathiyak (thama) thiyenawa hitan..
sthri sewanayak kala wigasinma eeka karanaya nisama bhikshuthwaya nathiwi thaman samanya ayek wena bawa un wahanse danna nisa.
eekane chuti ha patikkiyek kiwe.
"samawa illanna misa wena mokatada eya katha karanne.
amihiri siduwim boho ayata wela thiyanawa.
me wage charitha apata danagannawath labenne na.
indahita watena hiru kiranak harunu kota....
‘mulayak nomathi nam palayak hata nogani’.
eekath anithyamada manda.
me satahana krida anathuru pilibanda obage danumata.
minisa nowa danuma lowa palanaya karawi.
aya uyanpallek men penuna yamek sitagena sitinawa dutuwaya.
mudal nasthiwim athiwe.
wara wibhagaya sandaha pamanak prathibhurtha wannaki.
anadatha pana nopama nipuno kumaratha mana gajatha piruno..
wenin kawuruwath neweyi.
janadhipathi dhuraye sitiyadima 1969 di sakir husen miyagiyeya.
eya kandawanu labe sielon muwin.
‘sunethrayi mayi athara kisiyam aakarayaka bandimak thibuna.
mema lamun lingikawa ha manasikawa athawarayata lakkara thibunu bawayi pawasenne
aththatama boho kalayakata pasu narambaannata labunu athi sarthaka teli natyayak thamayi golu thaththa.
onna man poto ekakuth gaththa ape mathalanta balanna.

api wishwa widyalaya thula gathakarapu masa thunakata adhika kalaya thula api kala dewal walin wadathma aadambara wana karuna mokadda kiya wimasuwoth kiyannata thibena de thamayi "nawaka wadayata erehiwa prabala mathayaka sita, rujuwa katayuthu kirima" yanna.
asabhya prakasha panatha anuwa niruwath darshana sandaha mudal nomathiwa peni sitiyath ee chayarupaya mudranaya karanna wagakimata bhajanaya wenawa.
ewwayeth oya ihathaki anga lakshana serama thiyenawa.
muna gawa pana gahan nidahasa yayi bod gahan ratema kunu rasaya soya ape rate madhyaya lu
esema ajatakasha widyawa menma guptha lekhana kalawa wenuwen da ohu mahath meheyak itu kota thibe.
ragena pan surathata
me bawa nodanna ewun wanahi gon thakathiruwanya.
warthagatha jayagrahana walata honda ma udaharanaya widiyata mage mathakayata enne shri lankawe siwu wana agamathi thuma wana es. dab. aar. di. bandaranayaka mathithumawa.

pasugiyada athi wu ganwathuren wipathata path uthure janathawata sahanadhara labadime wadapiliwelak buddha shasana amathyanshaye da anugrahayen kriyathmaka kirimata samastha lanka shasanarakshaka mandalaya apeksha kara atha. 2019 janawari masa mul sathiye di mulathiw, kilinochchi disthrikkawalata wadama kara wipathata path janathawata sahanadhara bedadima sudusu yayi sithana bawada ema sangamaya sandahan karayi.
eewayin apa danuwath wuwata wada ohuge awankabhawaya ha kapawima pilibandawa gaurawayak apata athiwini.
mama nan kawadawath ee wage wadak kala kiyala mathaka na...:
api ne ban danne kollo kawuda kiyala...
ayi ithin nathi dewal kiyaddi umbaatath yaka naginawane.
thawath thiyenawa liyanna.
menna me wage wenna epa.
mathara katharagama margaye gamankarana oonama sancharakayaku atharamagadi mikiri saha pani rasa balimata pelambaenne "orijinal" mikiri athayi yana wishwasayeni.
boho dena obe nirmanaye, anuruwe dahak waradi obata pennala deyi.
ayiyawa me awurudde stech nagganna thamayi man kohoma hari uthsaha gaththe.
ethana sinu rasak wiya.
me liyawili wiyunu sahithyayen obbata gena yanna oona kiyala api hithuwata umbaa ehema hithanne nathi eka maha aparadayak . .
thopi eeka danaganiw."
hamawitama muwaga sinahawakin sarasagena sahalluwen wachana eliyata damuwada mahinda deshapriya mahathage wachana thula apuru sruju bawak randi thibe.
ithin grika purawruththayaka ena aakarayata ''lans lot'' kenek enne na samajaya galawa ganna.
eekane duka !!!
ee hama detama api pera kala pin paw balapanawa kiyalath oba dannawa.

dakunu kalifoniyawe pamanak 2000 kata aasanna pramanayak kiyawanawa.
ee nisa nawa aayathana ka්rama godanagimakin thorawa thibena yalpanagiya aayathana ka්rama binda damamin thibenneya’yi kiwa hakiya.

aduma rogaya mathuwi eya palanaya kala pasu nawatha sathiyakin ho dekakin wuwada rogaya mathuwime hakiyawa atha.rogaya hondin palanaya karaganima sandaha apa kumak kala yuthu dayi dan api soya balamu.

diyara kiri prachalitha kirima me atharedi siduwenawa.2016 di gampaha disawe deshiya kiri nishpadanaya ihala nanwimata nam madhya parimana kiri gowipalawal, litar 20ta wadi 300k sanwardhanaya kirimath parchas 20ka thruna waga eekaka 500k pihituwimath usas aaraye denun sulabha kirima sandaha abhijanana gowipala 39k sthapitha kirimath kotadeniyawa gawa aahara nishpadanagaraya sanwardhanaya kota masikawa gawa aahara metrik ton 200k nipadawiya yuthuyi.eeta amatharawa pradhana pasala aashrithawa diyara kiri alewisal pihituwima kiri athuru nishpadana sakasima sandaha puhunu kirima ha aadhara kirima kiri gowin ha kiri samithi sawibala ganwima.kese wethath me wanawita gampaha disawe dinakata nishpadanaya kerena deshiya kiri litar 35000 kiri litar 55000 dakwa wadi diyunu kirime salasumak disa sambandhikarana kamituwata idiripathwa thibenawa.

kimge priyathama warnaya wu la dumbauru paha komupiliyen sarasi tenis kridawa warnawath karana ayuruth, thama mithuriyaka samanga kelidelin sarisarana ayuruth owun thama kamarakacha wala satahan karagena thibune me aakarayata…

kirimen pasu in pas deneku bahira rogi anshaye prathikara laba giya bawath, bambaara praharayen thuwala labu wathu kamkaru kanthawan thidenek newasikawa prathikara labana bawayi bagawanthalawa pradehiya rohale waidyawarayeku kiya sitiye.
ada thiyena boho githa walin labanna puluwan wanne rasawin...

wikalpa kihipayakma thibenawa habayi ee eka eka wikalpaya anuwa anagathayedi labena mudal pramanaya wenas wenawa.

oba hithanawa niwaradiyi...

gettuwa idiripasa siti aarakshaka niladharingen ek ayaku atha radi gini awiya madak pahatha hela itha suparikshakariwa wan rathaya desata samipa wuye koyi mohothaka ho nawathath awi mana ganimata sudanamen bawa pahadaliya.

in asadhya thathwaye pasuwu kanthawak mahanuwara maha rohalata marukara yawa thibe, mema pirisa badulla,passara banadaranayaka mawathe padinchi pirisaki,anathurin thuwala laba aththe aar,ema,kusumawathi(39 ),aar,ema,siromala(42 ),ha ke,el,kapila(40 ) yana thidenaya.
sawimath wiya yuthuyi.
adala chodanawata waradakaruwan wu withthikaruwanta badulla mahadhikaranayen ada melesa maranaya daduwama niyama kala.
indhana lesa goma wiyala pawichchi kirima dakunu pranthawala sulabha ya.
pahatha thibenne ee hadayayi.
mema karunu anawaranaya wi aththe brithanyaye eest angliya wishwa widyalaye sidu karana lada parikshanayakata pasuwayi.
anthimata gewal langama inna, wiweka welawata ilektrikal wada karana kollek mata ahamben hambawuna.
peradiga shasthriya niyama ha siddhantha anuwa bhukampana athi wima pilibadawa wisthara kerena awastha kipayak prathamayen salaka balamu.
udaharanayak lesa peradeniya wishwa widyalaye boho windithayanta wishwa widyala baladharin kerehi wishwasayak nomathi nisa owun paminili nokarathi.

puwathpatha beda harime niyojithayeku wu sathasiwam baskaranta ohu siya aayathanika namaya salakunu kala beda harim rathaye asun gena sitiddi wedi thaba mara damune in themasak gatha wannatath kalini. 2007 di, udayan puwathpathe wimarshaka puwathpath kalawediyeku wu selwaraja rajiwarnam ghathanaya kerina.

wisheshayenma sandahan kala yuththe kirthiya, prashansawa labenna labenna aya nirahankara wena tharama ganayi.me wenakota aa aasiyawe wishishtathama rangana shilpin 25 dena atharata theri pathwi thibenawa.

ape thaththa langa patha indala kiyapi,
apata puluwan wenna oona deshapalanayath wiwechanayath eka pettiyakata dala mithrathwaya wenama thiyaganna.
meken ape aacharya, mahacharyakam siyallamath ahosi wenawa.
harima watina lipiyak...

thangalla sabhapathi naduwa nimawanathuru rimand atharamagadi apa na sarath dharmasena sancharaka hotalayakadi brithanya jathikayaku ghathanaya kirima, ohuge pemwathiya wu rusiyanu jathika kanthawakata athawara kirima pilibanda naduwe thunwani (3) withthikaru wana thangalla pradeshiya sabha sabhapathi sampath widanapathiranata niyama kara thibu apaya eeye awalangu kala kolambaa mahadhikarana winisuru rohini walgama mahathmiya ohu yalith rimand bharayata path karana lesa niyoga kalaya.

nikini punu poho dinaya bhikshunwahanse ha gihiya atharath anyonya sambandhathawak athiwa gihi pawidi depakshaya thulin yuthukam itu wena dinayak washayen sandahan kala hakiya.shasana prathipaththi walata anuwa bhikshun wahanselata was elambaimata dina dekak niyama wa atha.

durlabha ganaye budu pilimayak kirinda pansale gasak yatin hamuweyi | dinamina niwasa durlabha ganaye budu pilimayak kirinda pansale gasak yatin hamuweyi durlabha ganaye budu pilimayak kirinda pansale gasak yatin hamuweyi haliala pradeshiya lekam kottasayata ayath kirinda shri nigrodharama wiharasthana bhumiye pihiti nuga rukak yata thibi sambudu themangula nirupanaya karana katayam sahitha itha durlabha ganaye iparani buddha prathimawak hamuwu bawa ema wiharadhipathi pujya morathiha thilakasiri himiyo pawasathi.

rajitha senarathna amathiwaraya prakasha karana aakarayata dubayihi banku ginum prashnayak pilibandawa thaba thama daruwanta thibena prashnayak ganawath janadhipathi maithripala sirisena mahatha samanga thama kisidu awasthawaka katha kara nathayi hitapu janadhipathi mahinda rajapaksha mahatha prakasha kaleya.
wenas kirimata nohaki yayi pawasu aanduwa wenas kirime purogami mehewara kriyathmaka kaleda unwahanseyi.

shri lankawa danume kendrasthanayak kirime aramuna sakshath kara ganime wagakima obata pawarenawa. 2016 ilakkaya widya, ganitha anshayen siyayata 40 k dakwath wanija anshayen siyayata 35 dakwath wadi kirimayi.

me manobhawaya nisath, pemwathage parshwayen ellawana anum banum wiwechana nisath, siyadiwi nasaganime thiranaya aya ikman karanawa.
mewani roga walandimen warshikawa delakshayakata aasanna daruwan sankhyawak indiyawata ahimi wenawa.

- 2019 warshaye pebarawari masa 04 wana dinata yedena, 71 wana jathika dina ulelata adala wadasatahana piliyela kara awashya katayuthu sanwidhanaya saha meheyawima sandaha garu agramathyathumage sabhapathithwayen yuth janatha niyojithayin 13 denekugen samanwitha anukamituwak path kirima pinisa swadesha katayuthu amathya wajira abewardhana mathithuma idiripath kala yojanawa amathya mandalaya wisin anumatha karana ladi.

karalikara manthi්rawaru pirisak rajayata ek wu bawata sawadya pa්racharayak yawimata udarata palathe manthi්rawariyakata ha thawath pa්rabalayakuta ema kamituwedi bara di atha.ese ma ee pilibandawa esemes ha eemel ha faks mangin dadi pa්racharayak laba diya yuthu bawata wika්ramasinha mahatha kala yojanawata wiruddha wi ek ayek yojana kota aththe eya thamanta hithawath madhyawedin mangin sidu kala haki bawayi.uuwa palath sabha mathiwaranaya hethuwen mema masa 14 da pawathwimata niyamithawa thibu deshapalana mandala raswima kal damana lesata ema palath niyojanaya karana deshapalana kamitu samajikayin rasak niyojya nayaka karu jayasuriya mahatha gen illimak kota thibuna da ema illima da pasekala wika්ramasinha mahathage adahasakata anuwa juli 14 dama deshapalana raswima pawathwimata da yojana kota thibe.mangala - ranil sandhanayata pakshaye wadi pirisak wiruddha bawa ejapa maha lekamwaraya pa්rakasha kota athi athara eeta pilithuru di athi wika්ramasinha mahatha kiya aththe, mema masa 14 da deshapalana mandala raswimatath, 15 da kruthyadhikari mandalayatath yomu kota ‘sandhana’ yojanawa kese ho sammatha kara ganna bawayi.

eheth pa්ranandu hitapu janapathi mahinda rajapaksha samaga kiya aththe thaman samawa illimak sidunokala bawaya.pasu awasthawaka madhya hamuwak pawathwu ohu, kadawatimata onna menna thaththwayaka athi rajayata nawatha noyana bawa pa්rasiddhiyema pawasuwe ya.japana sancharayak atharathura di, hitapu janapathiwarayage gnyathiyaku menma rusiyawe hitapu shi්ra lanka thanapathi – wimarshana kihipayakma sadaha shi්ra lanka wimarshana ansha hata awashyama pudgalayaku wana – udayanga wirathunga mahatha hamuwuwe yayi, pa්ranandugen eeta pera awasthawaka polisiya pa්rashna kara thibina.
ee dharmaya ma guruwarayek washayen salakala asuru karagena inna eka thamayi sudusu” kiya.
